about_the_game: The Ford Focus RS Rally was introduced in late 2005, and was an immediate success taking its first win in Monte Carlo in 2006. In 2008 Jari-Matti Latvala became the youngest ever top level rally winner driving this car. This car was largely replaced by the smaller and more nimble Fiesta.
detailed_description: The Ford Focus RS Rally was introduced in late 2005, and was an immediate success taking its first win in Monte Carlo in 2006. In 2008 Jari-Matti Latvala became the youngest ever top level rally winner driving this car. This car was largely replaced by the smaller and more nimble Fiesta.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit versions of Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 10
  • Processor: AMD FX4300 or Intel Core i3 2130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD7750 or NVIDIA GTX650Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible soundcard
